sentences.english: All this fresh air reinvigorated me.
sentences.chinese: 清新的空气使我再次精神焕发。

sentences.english: There is nothing as refreshing as having a good rest.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么比好好休息更让人精神焕发的了。

sentences.english: The next morning, John came down to breakfast bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，约翰下来吃早饭，看起来精神焕发。

sentences.english: You'll return to your task refreshed and determined.
sentences.chinese: 回到办公桌后你会感到精神焕发，干劲十足。
